data.title: Publications
data.text:
Publications by George Church & colleagues. (Skip to Patents). (Skip to Papers in prep).

Click on titles for full text pdf files (for fair use) or click on the literature citation for pubmed abstract and journal links. Jump down to patents. Lab members names are in bold font. Suffix "s" on numbers means submitted, but not yet published. Suffix "a" means additional publications from the lab. Updated 24-Mar-02024 by GMC. 655 ORCID works ; Google Scholar citations=177895; h-index=205. Academic Chemistry Tree, Genetics Tree. As of 1-Feb-2022, 3615 co-authors on this page. (Erdős number = 4) Chemistry: #6(world), #1(Harvard)
